Next Big Event: Bonfire!

Start whittling your weenie roasters and come on out to Rick’s place on November 19th, 2011, for the largest* bonfire in Texas. We’ll have a roaring fire (as long as the fire ban is still lifted), food (S’mores?), and one heck of a good time.

If you need directions to Rick’s house, contact us.

*Bonfire not actual size.
